document_name: Signed Pro Doc_A Road to National Guidelines Guidelines to HIV Prevention Among MSM in Thailand.pdf
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/THA/00060374/Signed Pro Doc_A Road to National Guidelines Guidelines to HIV Prevention Among MSM in Thailand.pdf

outputs.output_descr:
The project's main targets and beneficiary are male who have sex with males (MSM) and transgenders, considered as one of the most vulnerable gender  sub-groups.  Greater understanding and involvement  on the HIV prevention services among this gender sub-group in all the stages of the project: research, consultation and proposing recommendation on the guidelines for MSM HIV prevention programming in Thailand.
Expected output:
1) identified best practices in MSM HIV prevention in Thailand as evidence for recommendation on the national guidelines for MSM HIV prevention in Thailand.
2) developed concept note in developing national guidelines for HIV prevention among MSM reflecting the frameworks, priority components, processes and end users.
outputs.output_title: Road to Nat'l Guideline for MS

project_descr: A Road to National Guidelines for HIV Prevention among MSM in Thailand
project_title: Road to Nat'l GuidelineforMSM HIV Prevention in Thailand
